objectives: Students will discuss health and fitness using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Romance themed scenarios related to health and fitness
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining health and fitness content with Romance narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore health and fitness through a Romance lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a romantic encounter or relationship development involving health and fitness

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to health and fitness in a romance context
Students engage in romance themed role-play about health and fitness using slang register
Students create original romance themed content about health and fitness in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe health and fitness in a Romance scenario?
What heart or passion might be involved in health and fitness?
Can you create a Romance story about health and fitness?
How does health and fitness change when viewed through a Romance perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this romance scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Romance situation involving health and fitness
roles: Character A: Using slang register in romance context
Character B: Responding in slang register within romance theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Romance theme: Love, relationships, emotional connections

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Romance themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
